name: SortedOracles
description: Maintains a sorted list of oracle exchange rates between CELO and other currencies.

functionDecorators.name: addOracle
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new Oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token.

parameterDecorators.name: oracleAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the oracle.

functionDecorators.name: getOracles
functionDecorators.description: Returns the list of oracles for a particular token.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token whose oracles should be returned.

functionDecorators.name: getRates
functionDecorators.description: Gets all elements from the doubly linked list.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

functionDecorators.name: getTimestamps
functionDecorators.description: Gets all elements from the doubly linked list.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

functionDecorators.name: getTokenReportExpirySeconds
functionDecorators.description: Returns the expiry for the token if exists, if not the default.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token.

functionDecorators.name: getVersionNumber
functionDecorators.description: Returns the storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

parameterDecorators.name: _reportExpirySeconds
parameterDecorators.description: The number of seconds before a report is considered expired.

functionDecorators.name: isOldestReportExpired
functionDecorators.description: Check if last report is expired.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: medianRate
functionDecorators.description: Returns the median rate.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

functionDecorators.name: medianTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Returns the median timestamp.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

functionDecorators.name: numRates
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of rates.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

functionDecorators.name: numTimestamps
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of timestamps.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeExpiredReports
functionDecorators.description: Removes a report that is expired.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

parameterDecorators.name: n
parameterDecorators.description: The number of expired reports to remove, at most (deterministic upper gas bound).

functionDecorators.name: removeOracle
functionDecorators.description: Removes an Oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token.

parameterDecorators.name: oracleAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: The index of `oracleAddress` in the list of oracles.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: report
functionDecorators.description: Updates an oracle value and the median. Note that only one of `lesserKey` or `greaterKey` needs to be correct to reduce friction.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token for which the CELO exchange rate is being reported.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of `token` equal to one CELO, expressed as a fixidity value.

parameterDecorators.name: lesserKey
parameterDecorators.description: The element which should be just left of the new oracle value.

parameterDecorators.name: greaterKey
parameterDecorators.description: The element which should be just right of the new oracle value.

functionDecorators.name: setReportExpiry
functionDecorators.description: Sets the report expiry parameter.

parameterDecorators.name: _reportExpirySeconds
parameterDecorators.description: The number of seconds before a report is considered expired.

functionDecorators.name: setTokenReportExpiry
functionDecorators.description: Sets the report expiry parameter for a token.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to set expiry for.

parameterDecorators.name: _reportExpirySeconds
parameterDecorators.description: The number of seconds before a report is considered expired.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
